txt.en: 'I think it is foolhardy to return Mazog to his allies, no matter how many dwarves might be saved.\n\n'But I doubt also that Mazog will ever reach Dol Guldur alive. He will surely try something on the journey, and I, Achardor, will be there to end his life. I will delight in my vengeance, and shed no tears for a plan unrealized.'
What do you think of this mission?
